English: (literary) (of a married woman) to visit one's parents
francais: (lit.) (d'une femme mariée) rendre visite à ses parents

d.f: `一般~`指~`女子~`出嫁~`後~，`回娘家~`向~`父母~`請安~。

English: (literary) (of a married woman) to visit one's parents
francais: (lit.) (d'une femme mariée) rendre visite à ses parents
